title: Soul of Light
summaries: Soul of Light is a Hardmode crafting material dropped by most enemies killed in the Underground Hallow (in the Cavern layer) with a 20*1/5 (20%) / 36*9/25 (36%) chance. This also includes enemies not native to the biome such as Granite Elementals. For details about enemies dropping souls, see Notes.

Crafting all items, including a full stack of five Light Discs and excluding the boss-summoning items and Key of Light, requires 118 / 109 / 89Souls of Light. One of each boss-summoning item and a Key of Light require an additional 24 / 14 Souls of Light, for a total of 142 / 133 / 103 Souls of Light.
